inclusion.criterion: Subject must have histologically or cytologically confirmed, resectable stage II (with positive margins), III, IVA, or IVB locoregionally advanced salivary gland carcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide tissue from a diagnostic biopsy or at the time of cancer resection, and blood samples before, during, and after treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HER2 positive disease as defined by any of the following: Tumor HER2 expression staining intensity of 2 or 3+ by IHC (from either a preoperative biopsy or resection specimen at the time of oncologic surgery)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status ≤ 1 (Karnofsky ≥ 60%, see Appendix A)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participant must have normal organ and marrow function as defined below within 14 days prior to study registration: leukocytes ≥ 3,000/mcL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum calcium (corrected for albumin value), magnesium, and potassium levels within normal limits per institutional standards.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must have a negative serum or urine pregnancy test (minimum sensitivity 25 IU/L or equivalent units of HCG) within 72 hours prior to the start of T-DM1
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with AJCC 2017 8th edition stage I or stage IVC (metastatic) disease, or unresectable disease.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subject who has had prior radiation and/or chemotherapy for head and neck cancer.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
